caption.p: TBAGeCl 3 in 12CE: (a) Cyclic voltammetry of TBAGeCl 3/12CE at graphene ( A ≈ 0.3 cm 2) and glassy carbon ( A = 0.07 cm 2) electrodes, v = 50 mV s –1, Pt gauze auxiliary electrode, and Zn/Zn 2+ RE. Arrows indicate the sweep direction. For comparison, also voltammetric background cycles in neat 12 CE from Figure 2 are plotted. (b) SEM image of a graphene electrode with potentiostatically deposited Ge (−0.3 V for 260 s). Corresponding AFM data is shown in Supporting Information Figure S8. White arrows indicate wrinkles in the graphene at which Ge islands nucleated. (c) Raman spectrum of a graphene electrode with potentiostatically deposited Ge. (d) SEM image of a graphene electrode with potentiostatically deposited Ge (−0.3 V for 7000 s).
